name: JSCodeFormatter
description: A tool used for formatting text to from camelCase, kebab-case and snake_case

scripts.build-cleanup: echo "Attempting to remove previous dist folder if it existed ..." && rimraf -f dist
scripts.build-prod: echo "Building optimized production version of application ..." && webpack --config webpack.prod.config.js
scripts.build-dev-serve-hot-reload: echo "Building dev version of application (hot-reloaded) at http://localhost:3001 ..." && webpack-dev-server --config webpack.dev.config.js --silent --hot --inline --port 3001 --content-base ./src/
scripts.start: npm run build-cleanup && npm run build-prod
